scripts.c-install: npm ci --no-shrinkwrap && cd src && npm ci
scripts.dev-server: cd src && cross-env HOST_ENV=local NODE_ENV=development npm run dev-server
scripts.dev-shell: npm run dev & npm run dev-server
scripts.debug-server: cd src && cross-env HOST_ENV=local NODE_ENV=development npm run dev-server -- --inspect
scripts.lint: cd src && cross-env HOST_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all --parallel lint:*
scripts.start: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run c-install && npm run build && npm prune --production && cd src && npm prune --production
